Action.Str: Station opened. Now play an arbitrary folder.
Don't worry I'll redirect you to the download page. After installation restart Composition Compass.
Don't worry I'll open the installer for you. After installation restart Composition Compass.
Don't worry I'll redirect you to the download page. After installation restart Composition Compass.

Action.label: Artist defined in title (before the - ) is used in case the artist-tag differs from the artist name specified in the title

Action.Str: This task downloads similar songs to the one specified to 'Pandora/Stations/<artist_name> (<title_name>)'.
Enter artist name;Multiple artists are *not* allowed!
Enter song name;Multiple songs are *not* allowed!

This task scrapes a Pandora station by repeatedly opening and closing the app. Song informations will be stored in 'Pandora/song_log.csv'. To cancel press Home button. Check if Scroball is setup before execution!
This task prepares a local station for playback in carmode. Volume Up moves a track to 'Pandora/.Automated/Favorites' directory, Volume Down moves one to 'Recycle Bin' directory.
This task downloads a playlist from YouTube to 'Pandora/Playlists/<playlist_name>/'.

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%kb_text Text Text present on the current input, if any</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%kb_text_selected Selected Text Text selected on the current input, if any</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%kb_text_after_cursor Text After Cursor Text after the cursor on the current input, if any</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%kb_text_before_cursor Text Before Cursor Text before the cursor on the current input, if any</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3></StringArray>

<StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%input Input The text that was inserted in the dialog</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>
[Ljava.lang.String;

Action.Str: Enter playlist name here (this will be the folder name):

This task scrapes songs from Spotify by quickly skipping through songs of e.g. a playlist. Song informations will be stored in 'Pandora/song_log.csv'. Important: Without proper cancellation (Home button) data loss may occur!

This task will remove all songs from the 'affected station' which are already present in the 'filter-station'. Intended to be used for removing duplicates after a download of new tracks. 'File not found' errors are normal and may occur.

Action.label: This task is intentionally implemented differently than the Last.fm download, as song logs get saved when the station is created. This is important for analysing them in Excel. Last.fm logs aren't important enough to be saved, however Pandora logs are due to the Music Genome Project which serves as backing.
Action.Str: This task downloads the songs specified in 'Pandora/song_log.csv' from YouTube. Ensure this file exists and contains song informations!

Action.Str: This task downloads the album of the given track to 'Pandora/Playlists/<artist_name> (<album_name>)'.
Enter artist name;Multiple artists are *not* allowed!
Enter track name;Multiple tracks are *not* allowed!
This task creates a new local station based on files of 'Pandora/Downloads'. Ensure this directory contains downloaded songs and 'Pandora/song_log.csv' exists!

Copying songs from 'Downloads' folder to 'Stations/<station_name>'.
This might take a while...

Action.label: Delete download archive so next download doesn't skip any songs
Create local backup of song_log.csv in case of failure

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%gd_id() File ID Unique ID for the file on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%gd_md5() MD5 MD5 checksum of the file on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%gd_mimetype() Mime Type Type of the file on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%gd_time() File Time The last time the file was modified by anyone. Expressed in Seconds since Epoch (similar to %TIMES)</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4>%gd_name() File Name Name of the file on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5>%gd_size() File Size Size of the file (in bytes) on Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6>%gd_uploaded() Uploaded true if file was uploaded, false otherwise</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES6><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7>%gd_weburl() Web URL URL that can be used to show the file on your Google Drive</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES7></StringArray>
[Ljava.lang.String;

<StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%input Input The text that was inserted in the dialog</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>
[Ljava.lang.String;

Action.Str:
Sorting out remaining remixes (whose video title didn't contain the filter keywords).
This might take a while...

Action.label: Remove remixes from songs in Downloads

Action.Str: This task downloads the most popular songs by the given artist to 'Pandora/Artists/<artist_name>'.
Enter artist name;Separate multiple names with ','.

Please select the root path of your internal sd-card (e.g. '/storage/emulated/0').
You only need to do this once ;)

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%input Input The text that was retrieved from the dialog</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0></StringArray>
[Ljava.lang.String;

Action.Str: This task downloads an album of the specified artist to 'Pandora/Playlists/<artist_name> (<album_name>)'.
Enter artist name;Multiple artists are *not* allowed!
Enter album name;Multiple albums are *not* allowed!
This tasks synchronises the 'Pandora/Logs' folder on this device with the remote song log folder on Google Drive. Ensure the two folders are properly configured in the 'Drive Sync' app.
This task allows to show artist info (name, biography and style) for any track. Volume button triggers will be disabled.

Vals.net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VA: <StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%http_data Data Data that the server responded from the HTTP request.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%http_file_output File Output Will always contain the file's full path even if you specified a directory as the File to save.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%http_response_code Response Code The HTTP Code the server responded</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%http_headers() Response Headers The HTTP Headers the server sent in the response. [Ljava.lang.String;

<StringArray sr=""><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0>%http_data Data Data that the server responded from the HTTP request.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES0><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1>%http_file_output File Output Will always contain the file's full path even if you specified a directory as the File to save.</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES1><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2>%http_response_code Response Code The HTTP Code the server responded</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES2><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3>%http_cookies Cookies The cookies the server sent in the response in the Cookie:COOKIE_VALUE format. You can use this directly in the 'Headers' field of the HTTP Request action</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES3><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4>%http_headers() Response Headers The HTTP Headers the server sent in the response. Each header is in the 'key:value' format</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES4><_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5>%http_response_length Response Length The size of the response in bytes</_array_net.dinglisch.android.tasker.RELEVANT_VARIABLES5></StringArray>
[Ljava.lang.String;

Action.Str: This task prepares the favorite folder for playback in carmode. Volume Up moves a track to 'More interesting' sub-folder, Volume Down to 'Less interesting' sub-folder.
